import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { gsap } from 'gsap' import style from './header.scss' const Header = () => { useEffect(() => { const mobileTrigger = document.getElementById('nav--mobile') gsap.set(mobileTrigger, { opacity: 0, height: 0 }) }, []) let menuActive = false function toggleMenu () { const element = document.getElementById('menu_toggle') element.classList.toggle('open') const mobileMenu = document.getElementById('nav--mobile') // menu.classList.toggle('active') if (menuActive === false) { gsap.to(mobileMenu, { opacity: 1, height: '100%', duration: 0.3 }) menuActive = true } else { gsap.to(mobileMenu, { opacity: 0, height: 0, duration: 0.3 }) menuActive = false } } return (
